# AnchoringComponent.Target.head

**Case**

An anchor point attached to the user’s head.

## Declaration

```swift
case head
```

## Human anchor targets

- **AnchoringComponent.Target.face**: An anchor point attached to the user’s face.
- **AnchoringComponent.Target.body**: An anchor point attached to a human body in motion within the scene.
- **AnchoringComponent.Target.hand(_:location:)**: An anchor point attached to a specific location on the user’s hand.
